agenda_items.name: Minutes
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the regular session meeting held on July 25, 2016. (Maricela de Rivera)

agenda_items.name: Monthly Financial Report
agenda_items.title:
Monthly Financial Report. (Lisa Patton)

INFORMATION ITEM

agenda_items.name: GFOA Award
agenda_items.title:
Government Finance Officers Association (GFOA) Award. (Kenneth McDonald)

INFORMATION ITEM

agenda_items.name: TDA Triennial Performance Review
agenda_items.title:
Final Report - Transportation Development Act (TDA) Triennial Performance Review. (Lisa Patton)

INFORMATION ITEM

attachments.filename: 10. Resolution for Fiscal Year 2017 Federal Transit Administration (FTA) Grant.pdf

agenda_items.name: Resolution for FY17 FTA Grant
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to adopt a resolution authorizing the President and CEO to file an application and execute a grant agreement with the Federal Transit Administration for $17,506,605 under the Fixing America’s Surface Transportation (FAST) Act. (Lisa Patton)

attachments.filename: 11. LBT1 Electric Bus Charging Station and Parking Lot Improvements.pdf

agenda_items.name: LBT1 Electric Bus Charging Station and Parking Lot Improvements
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize the President and CEO to enter into a contract with Eco Energy Solutions, Inc., for the construction of an Electric Bus Charging Station and Parking Lot Improvements at LBT1 to support the 10 Battery Electric Buses (BEBs) in production, for a total authorization amount not to exceed $939,333. (Rolando Cruz)

agenda_items.name: Security Officer Services Contract
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize the President and CEO to enter into a three-year contract with Universal Protection Service for the provision of security officer services at Long Beach Transit properties, at a cost of $1,195,595 with two, one-year options at $422,661 for Option Year One and $439,324 for Option Year Two, for a total authorization amount not to exceed $2,057,580. (Lee Burner)

attachments.filename: 13. TransitMaster Software Maintenance and Support Agreement.pdf

agenda_items.name: TransitMaster Software Maintenance and Support Agreement
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize the President and CEO to enter into an agreement with Trapeze Software Group for the ongoing maintenance and support of its TransitMaster brand software, which supports Long Beach Transit’s daily bus operations, for a total authorization amount not to exceed $1,150,163. (Patrick Pham)

agenda_items.name: Microsoft Software Licensing Enterprise Agreement
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to authorize the President and CEO to enter into a three-year contract with Insight Public Sector, Inc., for Microsoft Enterprise Software Licensing, which supports Long Beach Transit's daily computer operations, for a total authorization amount not to exceed $109,322 for year one of the contract. (Patrick Pham)

agenda_items.name: LBT Board Committee Structure
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to adopt staff’s recommendation to form two new advisory Board Committees: Finance and Operations; and Policy and Governance, commencing first quarter of calendar year 2017. (Debra Johnson)

coordinates.address: 333 W Ocean Blvd, Long Beach, CA 90802, USA
